version_description: 1) Minor change in Play Responsibly section
Thank you for using the Texas Lottery App.  We’ve modified the home screen so now you can see updated jackpot amounts for your favorite jackpot games!
App Preview added

Minor fixes
- QR barcode screen brightness increased to improve the readability
- Fixes to launch the app in English language when the device language is different
- Luck Zone – Remember me option added in login screen
- Luck Zone – player can scan their barcode from any game screen
- Contact us – will auto populate the device information
Minor fix in Barcode Scanner
LuckZone - Power Cruise changes
Corrected issues with location services. Fixed app crash on first install.
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Limited draws remain for the current Mega Millions game.  Starting October 28 the new  $2 Mega Millions will be available for purchase at your participating Texas Lottery® Retailer.

1. Limited draws remain for the current Mega Millions® game. Starting October 28 the new $2 Mega Millions will be available for purchase at your participating Texas Lottery® retailer.
2. Added important dates related to when scratch games end.
3. Added message notifications to the iPhone 8, 8Plus and X when using “Check My Ticket” and “Luck Zone” scanner functionality which is currently not supported. We are working on a fix for these devices.

TEXAS JUST GOT MORE MEGA!
• NEW $2 Mega Millions® starting October 28!
• $40 million starting jackpot
• Faster growing jackpots
• Better chance of winning $1,000,000

Introducing Just the Jackpot ™ feature starting October 28!
• Wagers are eligible for the Mega Millions Grand Prize ONLY!
• Two chances to win the Mega Millions Grand Prize for $3!
• Just the Jackpot wagers are not eligible to win any other prize (non-Grand Prize) in the Mega Millions game.
"Check Your Ticket" and "Luck Zone" scanner functionality is now compatible with the iPhone 8, 8 Plus and X.
Minor bug fixes.
Luck Zone – Special Draw feature changes

• Limited draws remain for the current Cash Five® game.  New CASH FIVE starts September 23!
• “How to Play” pages now include Prize Charts for all Draw Games with click to zoom option.

• Limited draws remain for the current Cash Five® game. New CASH FIVE starts September 23!
• “How to Play” pages now include Prize Charts for all Draw Games with click to zoom option.
• Minor bug fix

• Limited draws remain for the current Cash Five® game. New CASH FIVE starts September 23!
• “How to Play” pages now include Prize Charts for all Draw Games with click to zoom option.
• Minor bug fix

New CASH FIVE® starts September 23!
·    New $25,000 Top Prize!
·    Better odds of winning!
·    Guaranteed prizes!
·    Still $1 per play!

· Luck Zone bug fix.
· Improved compatibility with the new iPhone XS & XS Max.

• Limited draws remain for the Sum It Up!® add-on feature. Sum It Up! add-on feature ends April 27.
• Starting April 28, the new FIREBALL add-on feature for Pick 3™ and Daily 4™ will be available for purchase at participating Texas Lottery® retailers.

PLAY WITH FIRE! The new FIREBALL add-on feature starts April 28.
• Available on Pick 3™ and Daily 4™ games only.
• Offers more chances to win!

• Upgraded the scanner.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.

• Upgraded the scanner.
• Bug fixes and performance improvements.
• Routine Maintenance for the scanner.
Maintenance and Bug Fixes.
Ticket scanner maintenance and minor bug fixes.
Ticket scanner maintenance and minor bug fixes.
• Application optimization and bug fixes.
• Application optimization and enhancements.
Application optimization and enhancements.
Application optimization and enhancements.
Application optimization and enhancements.
Updated the scanner for check your tickets and Luck Zone entries.

• Display winning amounts over $599 for the Scan to Check Your Ticket Feature.
• Added animation for winning tickets in the Scan to Check Your Ticket Feature.​
• Application optimization and enhancements.​

Mondays just got better! Powerball® & Lotto Texas® will now include a new Monday drawing!

	• You can play 3 times a week – Monday, Wednesday & Saturday!
	• The first Monday drawing will occur on August 23, 2021.
	• Limited draws remain for the current Powerball® & Lotto Texas® draw schedule.

•	Introducing a new design and layout for easier navigation
•	Added features like biometrics, multi-board functionality for most draw games, and more
•	Optimized app for an overall better user experience
